summary: Request to support dynamic activities in the Ruby SDK, allowing activities to be defined and executed dynamically at runtime rather than requiring static registration.
userImpact: Users cannot dynamically define and execute activities at runtime, limiting flexibility in activity composition.
proposedFix: Implement support for dynamic activities in the Ruby SDK, with potential extension to dynamic workflows if needed.
resolutionDetails: Feature was implemented to support dynamic activity definition and execution in the Ruby SDK.
keyQuote: Support dynamic activities. Only activities are supported as of this issue creation, but if workflows come about in the interim, support their dynamic items too.
